Detailed Description

Skipjack declarations.

Documentation for Skipjack is available at http://csrc.nist.gov/encryption/skipjack/skipjack-kea.htm.

Id
skipjack.h,v 1.1 2003/03/30 12:42:21 m Exp

Define Documentation

#define SKIPJACK_BLOCK_LEN   8

SKIPJACK block length.

#define SKIPJACK_KEY_LEN   10

SKIPJACK key size.

Function Documentation

void skipjack_dec ( iu8 *  v,
iu8 *  k 
)

Skipjack decryption function.

This function decrypts v with k and returns the decrypted data in v.

Parameters:
v Array of eight iu8 values containing the data block.
k Array of ten iu8 values containing the key.

void skipjack_enc ( iu8 *  v,
iu8 *  k 
)

Skipjack encryption function.

This function encrypts v with k and returns the encrypted data in v.

Parameters:
v Array of eight iu8 values containing the data block.
k Array of ten iu8 values containing the key.
